settings.heading: UV-C LED Sterilization is the Future
settings.subheading:
UV-C LED Sterilization is the future of healthcare products that enable a return to work and school during the Covid-19 pandemic. Hyper is partnering with 59S to deliver the future of UV-C LED sanitization technology to the United States.

For more info, email us at B2B@Sanho.com.

settings.title: Hyper is Partnering with 59S, the Leader in UV-C LED Technology
settings.description: Asia-Pacific countries are returning to a new way of living with the aid of 59S products. We want to share this emerging healthcare technology with U.S. families and businesses.

settings.title: 59S Owns 80% of the UV-C Global Market
settings.description: 59S is the first company to mass-produce UV-C LED products and continue to dominate this emerging technology.
settings.title2: Why UV-C LED is better than UV-C Lamp?
settings.description2: One second of UV-C LED performance is equivalent to 50 seconds of traditional, less safe UV-C mercury lamp disinfection. UV-C LED is more efficient and has a higher disinfection power to unit area ratio.

settings.title: 360° UV-C Light Coverage is Critical to Truly Disinfect
settings.description: All-around UV-C light exposure is critical to achieve 99.9% sanitization. Most inferior products fail by not having UV-C LEDs surround desired material.
settings.description2: One UV-C LED bead can be used for over 10,000 hours. 59S product lifespan is much greater than mercury lamps.

settings.title: Who will Benefit from UV-C LED Technology?
settings.description: The importance of a healthy workplace is a top priority for businesses and schools to safely reopen during the COVID-19 pandemic. Clinics and hospitals around the world utilize ultraviolet light to kill viruses and bacteria; 59S UV-C LED technology brings safe and effective solutions for personal and commercial use.

settings.title: Commercial Sanitization for a Safer Workplace
settings.description: The importance of a healthy workplace is top priority as offices reopen during the COVID-19 pandemic.
settings.title2: Home use for Adults, Children, and Babies
settings.description2: 59S products are safe and effectively disinfect common children’s bottles, pacifiers, masks, and other common household goods.

settings.title: Proven Effective for Hospitals and Elder Care
settings.description: 59S UV-C LED hospital-grade technology brings safe and effective solutions for medical centers and care homes.
settings.title2: Classroom Safety is Essential to Reopen Schools
settings.description2: 59S UV-C LED solutions can disinfect classroom materials and enable extra safety for children and faculty.

settings.heading: X5 UV-C LED Sterilizing Wand
settings.description: The X5 is a portable and foldable wand powered by 20 UV-C LEDs to disinfect and eliminate up to 99.9% of viruses and bacteria. Disinfect anything, anytime, and anywhere.

settings.heading: T5 UV-C LED Sterilizing Box
settings.description: The ultimate multi-purpose sterilization solution. Medical-grade disinfection with 40 UV-C LEDs and 360º coverage eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria in under 3 mins. Optional built-in battery provides on-the-go disinfection.

settings.heading: S8 UV-C LED Sterilizing Lid
settings.description: 5 UV-C LEDs cover and clean cups, bowls, and small items with a sterilization rate up to 99.9%.

settings.heading: S1 UV-C LED Mini Sterilizer X1
settings.description: Light and portable with 5 UV-C LEDs that cover and clean your smartphone and small items with a sterilization rate up to 99.9%.

settings.heading: S1 UV-C LED Disinfecting Phone Box
settings.description: 360º coverage by 20pcs of UV-C LEDs (10 each on top and bottom) to kill 99.9% of germs, bacteria, and viruses.
